sections.MISSION:
Mustang Troop, 2CR conducts a stress shoot NLT 18OCT24 IVO Range 124 IOT certify Platoon Leadership as a culminating event in PL/PSG Academy
Commander’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this operation is to certify leaders as a culminating event in PL/PSG academy.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Move 1.4 km’s under load as a buddy team Complete all scored events as a team
Complete 10m stress shoot at Range with no incidents
Maneuver as a team back to SP after shooting portion
Training Objectives
Buy in (75 air squats)
Move 4x water cans as a team 400 meters
Sled drag 1x sled 200m as a team
Buddy team Run
50m Shuttle Run
Ammunition Gate / Code Lock
10m shooting portion
Resourcing
OIC: 1LT Dunn, Aaron / 1LT Milauskas, John RSO: SSG Baskeyfield
Ammo NCO: CPL Cryer Ammo Detail: 2x PAX Lane Safety: 4x NCO’s MEV Crew: Driver + CLS
Gate Guard: 1x PAX Billeting: N/A	Chow: A / N/A / N/A
Uniform: ACH, IOTV (front and back plates), eye pro, ear pro, gloves, Camelback, M4
